DOC.brief_title: To Investigate Pharmacological Effects , Drug Blood Levels Safety Intrauterine System Releasing Study Drug BAY1007626 Comparison Mirena Jaydess Healthy Young Women Treated 90 Days Determine Drug Dose Further Development
DOC.criteria: Healthy female subject . Willingness use nonhormonal method contraception study . This apply cycle precede pretreatment cycle end followup . Age screening : 1840 year inclusive . Body mass index ( BMI ) screening : ≥ 18 ≤ 32 kg/m² . History regular cyclic menstrual period . No clinically relevant abnormal finding pretreatment endometrial biopsy . Incompletely cure preexisting disease assume absorption , distribution , metabolism , elimination effect study drug normal . Any presence history know suspected malignant tumor , especially know suspected breast cancer progestinsensitive cancer . Any presence history know suspected benign tumor liver pituitary adrenal gland . Amenorrhea ( unknown reason , amenorrhea due hormonal treatment ) 3 month within 6 month first screen examination . Use shortacting preparation contain sex hormone cycle precede pretreatment cycle ( oral , transdermal , intravaginal , IUS ) . Use longacting preparation contain sex hormone within 40 week first screen examination ( longacting injectable implant ) . Clinically relevant finding physical examination ( e.g . pronounced varicosis , thrombophlebitis , evidence peripheral circulatory disturbance ) . Menstrual disorder suspicion ovarian failure ( e.g. , oligomenorrhea , amenorrhea , hypomenorrhea ) . Known bleed irregularity Current recurrent pelvic inflammatory disease , include pelvic inflammatory disease within 6 month prior insertion IUS active sexually transmitted disease . Anovulatory pretreatment cycle ( ovulation observe day 27 late ) . Positive result urine pregnancy test .
